es: Cuando otro personaje en comunicación con el oficial ejecutivo gasta un punto de Determinación, el oficial ejecutivo puede gastar 3 de Inercia (Inmediato) para permitir que ese personaje recupere el punto de Determinación gastado.
fr: Quand un autre personnage en communication avec le second dépense 1 point  de Détermination, ce dernier peut en retour dépenser 3 points d’Impulsion (immédiat) et lui permettre de regagner le point de Détermination qu’il vient de dépenser.
ru: Когда другой персонаж, который может общаться со старшим помощником, тратит балл Целеустремлённости, старший помощник может потратить 3 жетона Импульса (Мгновенное применение) и восстановить ему потраченный балл Целеустремлённости.

en: The operations manager manages and oversees all technical operations aboard or involving the ship, normally from the Operations station on the Bridge, or in conjunction with the chief engineer (on smaller ships, one officer may fill both roles). This often entails taking on the duties of a science officer, if there is no dedicated science officer in the senior staff.
de: Der oder die Operationsleiter/-in überwacht alle technischen Operationen an Bord oder in Bezug auf das Schiff, meist von der Operativen Station (Ops) auf der Brücke. Dabei kooperiert er oder sie mit dem oder der Chefingenieur/-in (auf kleineren Schiffen sind beide Rollen oft zusammengelegt). Hierfür muss auch oft die Position eines Wissenschaftsoffiziers eingenommen werden, falls diese Rolle nicht separat unter den Führungsoffizieren besetzt ist.
es: El jefe de operaciones gestiona y supervisa todas las operaciones técnicas a bordo o que involucran a la nave, normalmente desde la estación de operaciones en el puente, o en conjunto con el ingeniero jefe (en naves más pequeñas, un oficial puede desempeñar ambas funciones). Esto a menudo implica asumir las funciones de un oficial científico, si no hay un oficial científico dedicado entre el personal superior.
fr: Le chef des opérations gère et supervise toutes les opérations techniques se déroulant à bord ou impliquant le vaisseau, depuis le poste des opérations sur la passerelle ou en collaboration avec le chef-ingénieur (sur des vaisseaux plus petits, un officier peut remplir les deux rôles). Cela implique souvent d’assumer les fonctions d’un officier scientifique, s’il n’y en a pas parmi les officiers.
ru: Глава оперативной службы отвечает за все технические операции, совершаемые на борту или с участием корабля, как правило, с поста оперативной службы на мостике или находясь во взаимодействии с главным инженером (на небольших кораблях один офицер может занимать обе должности). Он также часто принимает на себя обязанности научного офицера, если такового нет среди старшего состава экипажа.
pt-BR: O gerente de operações administra e supervisiona todas as operações técnicas a bordo ou envolvendo a nave, normalmente da estação de Operações na Ponte de Comando, ou em conjunto com o engenheiro-chefe (em naves menores, um oficial pode ocupar ambas as funções). Isso frequentemente envolve assumir as tarefas de um oficial de ciências, se não houver um oficial de ciências dedicado na equipe sênior.

en: When the operations manager succeeds at a Task assisted by the ship’s Computers or Sensors, or using a tricorder, the character generates one bonus Momentum, which may only be used on the Obtain Information Momentum Spend.
es: Cuando el jefe de operaciones tiene éxito en una tarea con la ayuda del ordenador o sensores de la nave, o usando un tricorder, el personaje genera una Inercia adicional, que solo se puede usar en el gasto de Inercia para obtener información.
fr: Quand le chef des opérations réussit une Tâche à l’aide des ordinateurs ou des détecteurs du vaisseau, ou en utilisant un tricordeur, il génère 1 point d’Impulsion bonus, qui ne peut être utilisé que pour l’Impulsion Obtention d’informations.
ru: Успешно выполнив Задачу с Помощью трикодера, Компьютеров или Сенсоров звездолёта, глава оперативной службы получает 1 дополнительный жетон Импульса, который может потратить по правилу «Получить информацию».

en: The chief engineer is responsible for ensuring that the ship remains operational and functional, and commands the engineering department aboard the ship.
de: Der oder die Chefingenieur/-in leitet die Technische Abteilung an und ist dafür zuständig, dass die Schiffssysteme funktionieren.
es: El ingeniero jefe es responsable de garantizar que la nave permanezca operativa y funcional, y dirige el departamento de ingeniería a bordo de la nave.
fr: Il est responsable de la bonne marche du navire et dirige le département ingénierie à bord.
ru:
Главный инженер отвечает за работоспособность
 и функционирование корабля и руководит инженерной службой на его борту.
pt-BR: O engenheiro-chefe é responsável por garantir que a nave permaneça operacional e funcional, além de comandar o departamento de engenharia a bordo da nave.

en: When aboard the ship, the chief engineer always has the Advantage “Engineering Department”, which represents the ship’s complement of engineers and technicians.
es: Cuando está a bordo de la nave, el ingeniero jefe siempre tiene "Departamento de Ingeniería" como ventaja, que representa el complemento de ingenieros y técnicos de la nave.
fr: Quand il est sur le navire, le personnage bénéficie toujours de l’Avantage « Département d’Ingénierie », représentant l’ensemble des ingénieurs et des techniciens du bord.
ru: Находясь на звездолёте, он даёт Преимущество «Инженерная служба», как если бы звездолёт был полностью укомплектован инженерами и техниками.

en: The chief of security oversees the ship’s security department, and is responsible for ensuring the safety of the ship and crew during missions, for the investigation of disciplinary and criminal matters, and for overseeing the protection of important persons aboard the ship. On many ships, the chief of security operates from the Tactical station on the bridge.
de: Der oder die Sicherheitschef/-in steht den Sicherheitskräften auf dem Schiff vor und ist für die Sicherheit von Crew und Schiff während Missionen verantwortllich. Außerdem ist er oder sie für disziplinarische Angelegenheiten, Untersuchungen von Verbrechen und den Schutz wichtiger Personen zuständig. Auf vielen Schiffen ist sein oder ihr Dienstposten die Taktische Station auf der Brücke.
es: El jefe de seguridad supervisa el departamento de seguridad de la nave y es responsable de garantizar la seguridad la nave y la tripulación durante las misiones, de la investigación de asuntos disciplinarios y penales y de supervisar la protección de personas importantes a bordo. En muchas naves, el jefe de seguridad opera desde la consola táctica en el puente.
fr: Le chef de la sécurité supervise le ser-vice du même nom. Il est responsable de la sécurité du navire et de l’équipage pendant les missions, des enquêtes disciplinaires et criminelles et de la protection des personnes importantes qui se trouvent à bord. Sur de nombreux vaisseaux, le chef de la sécurité se trouve au poste Tactique sur la passerelle.
ru:
Этот офицер управляет службой и несёт ответственность за корабль и экипаж
во время миссий, расследует дисциплинарные проступки и уголовные дела, а также обеспечивает защиту важных лиц на борту. На многих кораблях работает за тактическим постом на мостике.
pt-BR: O chefe de segurança supervisiona o departamento de segurança da nave e é responsável por garantir a segurança da nave e da tripulação durante missões, pela investigação de assuntos disciplinares e criminais e por supervisionar a proteção de pessoas importantes a bordo da nave. Em muitas naves, o chefe de segurança opera a partir da estação Tática na ponte de comando.

en: When aboard the ship, the chief of security always has the Advantage “Security Detachment”, which represents the ship’s security personnel.
es: Cuando está a bordo de la nave, el jefe de seguridad siempre tiene la ventaja "Equipo de seguridad", que representa al personal de seguridad de la nave.
fr: Quand il est sur le navire, le chef de la sécurité bénéficie toujours de l’Avantage « Détachement de Sécurité », représentant l’ensemble du personnel de sécurité du bord.
ru: Находясь на борту звездолёта, он всегда получает Преимущество «Отряд службы безопасности», как если бы звездолёт был полностью  комплектован сотрудниками службы безопасности.

en: The chief medical officer, also known as ship’s surgeon, or ship’s doctor, is responsible for the health and wellbeing of the crew and other persons aboard the ship, and leads the ship’s medical department. A chief medical officer can order, and countermand the orders of, senior officers where matters of that officer’s health are concerned.
de: Dieser Posten, mitunter auch als Schiffsarzt bzw. Schiffsärztin bezeichnet, ist für die Gesundheit und das Wohlergehen der Crew und anderer Personen an Bord zuständig, sowie leitet das medizinische Personal an. Der Chefarzt oder die Chefärztin kann Befehle vorgesetzter Offiziere außer Kraft setzen, wenn medizinische Gründe dafür sprechen.
es: El oficial médico en jefe, también conocido como el médico de la nave, es responsable de la salud y el bienestar de la tripulación y de otras personas a bordo de la nave, y dirige el departamento médico de la nave. Un oficial médico en jefe puede ordenar y revocar las órdenes de oficiales superiores en lo que respecta a cuestiones de salud.
fr: Responsable de la santé et du bien-être de l’équipage et des autres passagers, le médecin-chef, également appelé chirurgien de bord ou médecin de bord, est à la tête du département médical du navire. Il peut donner des ordres et des contrordres aux officiers du vaisseau quand leur santé est concernée.
ru: Главный медицинский офицер, также судовой хирург или главный врач; отвечает за здоровье и благополучие экипажа и других лиц, находящихся на борту, и руководит медицинской службой. Может приказывать старшим офицерам и отменять их приказы, если речь идёт об их здоровье.
pt-BR: O oficial médico chefe, também conhecido como cirurgião da nave ou médico da nave, é responsável pela saúde e pelo bem-estar da tripulação e das outras pessoas a bordo da nave, chefiando o departamento médico da nave. Um oficial médico chefe pode ordenar e revogar as ordens dos oficiais sêniores em questões de saúde.

en: When aboard the ship, the chief medical officer always has the Advantage “Medical Department”, which represents the ship’s medical personnel.
es: A bordo del barco, el oficial médico en jefe siempre cuenta con el “Departamento Médico” como ventaja, que representa al personal médico de la nave.
fr: Quand il est sur le navire, le médecin-chef bénéficie toujours de l’Avantage « Département médical », représentant l’ensemble du personnel médical de bord.
ru: Находясь на борту звездолёта, главный медицинский офицер всегда получает Преимущество «Медицинская служба».

en: A science officer is responsible for advising the commanding officer of all matters scientific, providing hypotheses in matters concerning the unknown. Not all ships have a dedicated science officer within the senior staff, often having the operations manager take on these duties.
de: Der Wissenschaftsoffizier oder die Wissenschaftsoffizierin berät den Captain in allen wissenschaftlichen Fragen und formuliert Hypothesen zu allen unbekannten Phänomenen. Nicht jedes Schiff weist einen solchen Posten auf, in solchen Fällen nimmt oft der oder die Operationsleiter/-in diese Aufgaben wahr.
es: El oficial científico es responsable de asesorar al oficial al mando en todos los asuntos científicos, proporcionando hipótesis en asuntos relacionados con lo desconocido. No todos las naves tienen un oficial científico en exclusiva dentro del personal superior, y a menudo el jefe de operaciones asume estas tareas.
fr: Il est chargé de conseiller le commandant sur tous les sujets scientifiques et d’émettre des hypothèses sur ce qui est inconnu. Tous les navires n’ont pas d’officier attitré à cette fonction parmi les cadres du vaisseau, et c’est souvent le chef des opérations qui s’en charge.
ru: Отвечает за консультирование командира по всем научным вопросам и предоставляет гипотезы о неизвестных  явлениях. Не на всех кораблях есть  специальный научный офицер, и часто его обязанности выполняет глава оперативной службы.
pt-BR: Um oficial de ciências é responsável por aconselhar o oficial comandante sobre todos os assuntos científicos, fornecendo hipóteses em assuntos a respeito do desconhecido. Nem todas as naves têm um oficial de ciências dedicado entre os funcionários seniores, frequentemente tendo o gerente de operações a cargo disso.

en: When the science officer succeeds at a Task assisted by the ship’s Computers or Sensors, or using a tricorder, the character generates one bonus Momentum, which may only be used on the Obtain Information Momentum spend.
es: Cuando el oficial científico tiene éxito en una tarea asistido por el ordenador o los sensores de la nave, o usando un tricorder, el personaje genera Inercia adicional, que solo se puede usar en el gasto de Inercia para la obtención de información.
fr: Quand l’officier scientifique réussit une Tâche à l’aide des ordinateurs ou des détecteurs du vaisseau, ou d’un tricordeur, il génère 1 point d’Impulsion bonus, qui ne peut être utilisé que pour l’Impulsion Obtention d’informations.
ru: Успешно выполнив Задачу с Помощью трикодера или Компьютеров или Сенсоров корабля, он получает 1 дополнительный жетон Импульса, который  можно применить только чтобы «Получить информацию».

en: Not a typical senior staff role, some captains, particularly those operating in uncharted space, choose the most senior helmsman or flight control officer to serve as senior staff as well.
de: Auch wenn dies meist keine Führungsposition ist, nehmen manche Captains, vor allem wenn sie in unbekannten Raum vordringen, doch ihre/-n erfahrenste/-n Steuermann/-frau in die Riege der Führungsoffiziere auf.
es: No es una función típica del personal superior; algunos capitanes, particularmente aquellos que operan en espacios inexplorados, eligen al timonel o al oficial de control de vuelo de mayor rango para que también sirva como personal superior.
fr: Ce n’est pas une fonction typique parmi les officiers mais certains capitaines, en particulier ceux qui naviguent dans l’espace non cartographié, intègrent le timonier ou le contrôleur de vol le plus expérimenté dans leur équipe d’officiers.
ru:
Не самая типичная для старших офицеров должность. Некоторые капитаны, особенно действующие
 в неизведанном космосе, назначают старшим офицером также главного рулевого или офицера-навигатора.
pt-BR: Não sendo uma típica função sênior da equipe, alguns capitães, particularmente aqueles operando em espaço desconhecido, escolha o timoneiro ou oficial de controle de voo mais sênior para servir como funcionário sênior também.

en: When the flight controller is required to analyze or repair technology related to flight or propulsion, they may use the Conn Discipline instead of Engineering.
es: Cuando se requiere que el controlador de vuelo analice o repare tecnología relacionada con el vuelo o la propulsión, podrá utilizar la Disciplina Pilotaje en lugar de Ingeniería.
fr: Quand on lui demande d’analyser ou de réparer une technologie liée au vol ou à la propulsion, le contrôleur de vol peut utiliser sa Discipline de Pilotage à la place de l’Ingénierie.
ru: Если он изучает или чинит любые устройства, связанные с полётом или системами двигателя, то может использовать Навигацию вместо Инженерии.

en: On larger ships and starbases, it’s common to have personnel dedicated to the mental soak. Some captains regard them as valuable advisors, as their training covers both culture and psychology, making them exceptionally good at reading the moods and intentions of others.
de: Auf größeren Schiffen oder Sternenbasen ist es üblich, dass sich ein Offizier oder eine Offizierin um das mentale Wohlergehen der Crew kümmert. Manche Captains sehen diese Offiziere als wertvolle Berater, da sie sich sowohl in kulturellen Fragen als auch in Psychologie auskennen und gut in der Lage sind, die Motive und Stimmungen anderer zu verstehen.
es: En naves y bases estelares más grandes, es común tener personal dedicado a la asistencia mental. Algunos capitanes los consideran asesores valiosos, ya que su formación abarca tanto la cultura como la psicología, lo que los hace excepcionalmente buenos para interpretar los estados de ánimo y las intenciones de los demás.
fr: Sur les vaisseaux plus gros et les bases stellaires, il est courant de trouver du personnel dédié au bien-être mental de l’équipage. Certains capitaines les tiennent en haute estime car leur formation et leurs conseils couvrent les domaines culturels et psychologiques, ce qui les rend exceptionnellement doués pour comprendre les humeurs et les intentions.
ru: На больших кораблях и звёздных базах есть персонал, занимающийся психологической поддержкой. Некоторые капитаны считают их ценными советниками, поскольку их обучение охватывает как культуру, так и психологию, что позволяет им точно считывать чужие настроения и намерения.
pt-BR: Em naves maiores e bases estelares, é comum ter pessoal dedicado à saúde mental. Alguns capitães os consideram conselheiros valiosos, já que o treinamento deles cobre cultura e psicologia, tornando-os excepcionalmente bons em ler o humor e as intenções dos outros.

en: After succeeding at a Task to determine the emotional state or intent of another living creature, the ship’s counselor gains one bonus Momentum, which may only be used on the Obtain Information Momentum Spend.
es: Después de tener éxito en una tarea para determinar el estado emocional o la intención de otra criatura viviente, el consejero de la nave obtiene 1 Inercia adicional, que solo puede usarse en el gasto de Inercia para obtener información.
fr: Après avoir réussi une Tâche visant à déterminer l’état émotionnel ou l’intention d’une créature vivante, le conseiller du navire gagne 1 point d’Impulsion bonus, qui ne peut être utilisé que pour l’Impulsion Obtention d’informations.
ru: Когда корабельный советник успешно выполняет Задачу по определению эмоционального состояния или намерений другого живого существа, он получает 1 дополнительный жетон Импульса, который можно применить только чтобы «Получить информацию».

en: More common in the earlier days of Starfleet, dedicated communications officers are typically skilled in linguistics and cryptography, and aided with advanced translation and decryption technologies, and thus valuable during encounters with both new cultures, and with hostile ones.
de: Vor allem in den früheren Jahren der Sternenflotte gab es spezialisierte Kommunikationsoffiziere, die üblicherweise gut ausgebildete Linguisten und Kryptographen waren und unterstützt von der modernsten Technologie Schlüsselrollen im Kontakt mit freundlichen und feindlichen neuen Kulturen einnahmen.
es: Más común en los primeros días de la Flota Estelar, los oficiales de comunicaciones dedicados suelen tener habilidades en lingüística y criptografía, y cuentan con tecnologías avanzadas de traducción y descifrado, por lo que son valiosos durante los encuentros tanto con culturas nuevas como con culturas hostiles.
fr: Cette fonctionétait plus répandue aux débuts de Starfleet, et elle est occupée par des officiers dévoués, compétents en langues et en cryptographie et assistés des dernières technologies en matière de traduction et de décryptage. C’est un atout précieux quand le navire rencontre des cultures nouvelles ou hostiles.
ru:
Чаще встречающиеся в более ранние годы существования Звёздного флота узкоспециализированные офицеры связи владеют языками
 и криптографией, используют передовые технологии
 перевода и расшифровки и важны как при встрече с новыми, так и с враждебными цивилизациями.
pt-BR: Mais comuns nos primórdios da Frota Estelar, oficiais de comunicações dedicados normalmente são habilidosos em linguística e criptografia e auxiliam com tecnologias avançadas de tradução e decodificação, portanto, são valiosos durante encontros com novas culturas e com povos hostis.

en: When a Task attempted by the communications officer is increased in Difficulty because of an unfamiliar language or encryption, ignore that Difficulty increase.
es: Cuando la dificultad de una tarea que intenta el oficial de comunicaciones aumenta debido a un idioma o encriptación desconocidos, ignora ese aumento de dificultad.
fr: L’officier des communications ne tient pas compte de l’augmentation de difficulté d’une Tâche qu’il entreprend si elle est causée par une langue ou un codage inhabituel
ru: Если сложность Задачи выполняемой офицером связи увеличивается из-за нового языка или шифра, то увеличение сложности можно проигнорировать.

en: Select three additional Focuses, reflecting areas of expertise or subjects that pertain to the admiral’s assignment. At the start of each mission, the admiral chooses one of their three Focuses, and every Main Character receives that as an additional Focus for the mission, due to additional briefings and instructional resources.
es: Seleccione tres Especialidades adicionales, que reflejen áreas de especialización o temas relacionados con la asignación del almirante. Al comienzo de cada misión, el almirante elige uno de sus tres Especialidades, y cada personaje principal lo recibe como una Especialidad adicional para la misión, debido a sesiones informativas y recursos de instrucción adicionales.
fr: Choisissez 3 spécialisations supplémentaires, qui reflètent les zones d'expertise ou les sujets qui se rapportent au role d'Amiral. Au début de chaque mission, l'amiral choisit  une de ces trois spécialisations, et chaque personnage principal bénéficie de cette spécialisation supplémentaire pour la durée de la mission, grace a ses instructions et briefings.
ru: Выберите три дополнительные Специализации, отражающие область знаний или предметы, относящиеся к заданию адмирала. В начале каждой миссии адмирал выбирает одну из трех Специализаций и каждый главный герой получает ее в качестве дополнительного Специализации для миссии, благодаря дополнительным инструктажам и учебным ресурсам.

en: Not a typical senior staff role, some captains, particularly those operating in uncharted space, choose the most senior navigator to serve as senior staff as well.
es: No es una función típica del personal superior; algunos capitanes, particularmente aquellos que operan en espacio inexplorado, eligen al navegante de mayor rango para que también sirva como personal superior.
fr: Membre atypique du pont superieur, le navigateur est généralement choisi par le capitaine, en particulier dans les territoires non cartographiés, parmi les meilleurs pilotes du vaisseau

en: When the navigator is required to analyze, or repair technology related to flight or propulsion, they may use the Conn Discipline instead of Engineering.
es: Cuando se requiere que el navegante analice o repare tecnología relacionada con el vuelo o la propulsión, podrá utilizar la Disciplina Pilotaje en lugar de Ingeniería.
fr: Quand le navigateur doit analyser ou reparer une technologie liée au vol ou a la propulsion, il peut utiliser la discipline Pilotage au lieu d'Ingénierie

en: Descriptions of mass destruction or genocide
es: Descripciones de destrucción masiva o genocidio
fr: Descriptions de Destruction de Masse et de Génocide

en: Harm to minority groups, targeted hate crimes
es: Daño a grupos minoritarios, objetivo de crímenes de odio
fr: Maltraitance envers des minorités, crimes de haine ciblés

es: Mecánicas de traidor / Jugador vs. Jugador (JcJ)

en: Directed hate against other species (e.g., Klingons, Humans)
es: Odio dirigido hacia otras especies (ej. Klingos, Humanos...)
fr: Haine dirigée envers d'autres espèces (ex : Klingons,humains

es: Atrapamiento; ser enterrado bajo tierra, etc.

en: Lack of personal agency or ability to change events
es: Falta de control sobre los eventos

ru: Новый бланк персонажа 2го издания пол листа

fr: Feuille de personnage TNG (format lettre US portrait)
Feuille de personnage de soutien (demi page)
ru: Бланк вспомогательного персонажа на пол листа

fr: Feuille de personnage TNG (format lettre US paysage)
Feuille de personnage TNG standard (format lettre US)

es: Registro de personal de la Flota Estelar

en: In the aftermath of the Battle of Wolf 359, Starfleet saw the need for a heavily armed and combat-capable starship that could perform patrol assignments and maintain a constant presence in a sector of space to provide support or direct action in combat assignments, but still be able to contribute to the primary goal of Starfleet in exploration and discovery. The design that the Advanced Starship Design Bureau chose for this project was one that had been first proposed in the mid-23rd century, but technological limitations prevented its proper construction until then. When updated with the latest technologies, the new U.S.S. Akira was so successful in its initial patrols that Starfleet immediately ordered the class into wide production.
es: Después de la Batalla de Wolf 359, la Flota Estelar vio la necesidad de una nave estelar fuertemente armada y con capacidad de combate que pudiera realizar tareas de patrulla y mantener una presencia constante en un sector del espacio para proporcionar apoyo o acción directa en tareas de combate, pero aún así ser capaz de contribuir al objetivo principal de la Flota Estelar en exploración y descubrimiento. El diseño que la Oficina de Diseño Astronaval Avanzado (ODAA) eligió para este proyecto fue uno que se había propuesto por primera vez a mediados del siglo XXIII, pero las limitaciones tecnológicas impidieron su correcta construcción hasta entonces. Cuando se actualiza con las últimas tecnologías, la nueva U.S.S. Akira tuvo tanto éxito en sus patrullas iniciales que la Flota Estelar inmediatamente ordenó la producción amplia de la clase.
fr: En 2367, suite à la Bataille de Wolf 359, Starfleet comprit la nécessité d’un vaisseau bien plus lourdement armé. Un navire qui pourrait patrouiller et défendre de vastes portions de territoire contre d’éventuelles incursions des Borgs, tout en poursuivant sa mission principale, celle de tous les vaisseaux Starfleet : explorer l’inconnu. Le Bureau de Conception de Vaisseau Avancé des Chantiers Spatiaux d’Antares reprit le croquis d’un modèle qui avait été abandonné, et donna naissance à l’U.S.S. Akira en 2368. Les tests furent si concluants que Starfleet Command demanda sur-le-champ une production de masse.

en: The Starfleet Exploratory Division and the Federation Science Council began to see a steady decline in scientific returns from deep space missions by the beginning of the 24th century. Starfleet had been relying on Excelsior-class and the few Constitution-class starships still in service to continue its aims of discovery, but even with the planned refits of those spaceframes, they still required visits to logistical hubs every five years as systems wore down. Utopia Planitia Fleet Yards began to develop a new deep-space exploration cruiser that would address these concerns and allow a spaceframe to go deeper into the unknown. The Ambassador class was developed and launched in 2335, and many of the engineering techniques, design ideas, and technologies created for this starship would continue to be refined over the coming decades and become the basis for the Galaxy class.
es: La División de Exploración de la Flota Estelar y el Consejo Científico de la Federación comenzaron a ver una disminución constante en los resultados científicos de las misiones al espacio profundo a principios del siglo XXIV. La Flota Estelar había estado confiando en las naves clase Excelsior y las pocas naves clase Constitución que todavía estaban en servicio para continuar con sus objetivos de exploración, pero incluso con las remodelaciones planificadas de esos diseños, todavía requerían visitas a los centros logísticos cada cinco años a medida que los sistemas se iban desgastando. Los muelles de Utopia Planitia comenzaron a desarrollar una nueva nave de exploración para el espacio profundo que cubriría estas preocupaciones y permitiría que una nave se adentrara aún más en lo desconocido. La clase Ambassador fue desarrollada y lanzada en 2335, y muchas de las técnicas de ingeniería, ideas de diseño y tecnologías creadas para esta nave estelar continuarían perfeccionándose durante las próximas décadas y se convertirían en la base de la clase Galaxy.

en: The Archer class was designed to be a next-generation pathfinder, intended for long-range scouting missions and for pushing the boundaries of the Federation out farther and faster than any other Starfleet ship class. The class’s design team benefitted from the research gained via more than a decade’s worth of technological advances installed on Constitution, Hermes, Ptolemy, and Saladin class vessels, resulting in the Archer-class boasting some of the most advanced impulse drives and RCS thruster suites yet installed on a Starfleet vessel. The ship’s design is compact, consisting of a three-deck primary hull containing all ship systems save for the two outboard warp nacelles connected by short struts to the primary hull. Archer class vessels would continue in service until the mid-24th century when Danube-class runabouts began to take over the roles they once filled.
es: La clase Archer fue diseñada para ser una nave pionera de nueva generación, destinada a misiones de exploración de largo alcance y para ampliar los límites de la Federación más lejos y más rápido que cualquier otra clase de nave de la Flota Estelar. El equipo de diseño de la clase se benefició de la investigación obtenida a través de más de una década de avances tecnológicos instalados en naves de las clases Constitución, Hermes, Ptolomeo y Saladino, lo que dio como resultado que la clase Archer cuente con algunos de los propulsores de impulso y conjuntos de propulsores RCS más avanzados hasta el momento. instalado en una nave de la Flota Estelar. El diseño de la es compacto y consta de un casco principal de tres cubiertas que contiene todos los sistemas de a borto, excepto las dos barquillas de curvatura exteriores conectadas por anclajes cortos al casco principal. Las naves de la clase Archer continuarían en servicio hasta mediados del siglo XXIV, cuando los runabouts de la clase Danubio comenzaron a asumir las funciones que alguna vez desempeñaron.

en: As the Federation rapidly spread across the Orion Spur in the 2350s, Starfleet was seeing a lack of vessels able to respond to needs of all kinds inside the borders of the polity. Starfleet opened up the possibility for member worlds to design and build their own starship class to be able to respond to issues they felt were pressing to their own colonies and interests. Earth presented the California class based on already standardized Starfleet designs, but with features that were Earth specific, and would go on to influence the Galaxy-class starships of the next decade. California-class vessels were seen as dependable workhorses, but were never built in numbers comparable to Excelsior- and Miranda-class vessels, making them rarely seen outside of Human and cetacean dominated volumes of the Federation. They continued to be used by Starfleet in front line roles until the mid-25th century when they were slowly phased into civilian use.
es: A medida que la Federación se expandía rápidamente por el Brazo de Orion en la década de 2350, la Flota Estelar estaba viendo una falta de naves capaces de responder a necesidades de todo tipo dentro de las fronteras del ambito político. La Flota Estelar se abrió a la posibilidad para que los mundos miembros diseñaran y construyeran su propia clase de nave estelar para poder responder a los problemas que sentían que presionaban a sus propias colonias e intereses. La Tierra presentó la clase California basada en diseños ya estandarizados de la Flota Estelar, pero con características que eran específicas de la Tierra y que influirían en las naves estelares clase Galaxy de la siguiente década. Las naves de clase California fueron vistas como caballos de batalla de confianza, pero nunca se construyeron en cantidades comparables a las naves de clase Excelsior y Miranda, lo que las hace rara vez vistas fuera de los volúmenes de la Federación dominados por humanos y cetáceos. La Flota Estelar continuó utilizándolos en funciones de primera línea hasta mediados del siglo 25, cuando poco a poco fueron incorporándose al uso civil.

en:
The successes seen in the other classes resulting from Operation Next Step gave the Admiralty hope that other ideas that had been proposed in the first years of the project could be expanded upon and fully realized. One such concept was a “rapid response frigate” that was the same dimensions as the earlier Next Step designs. With the Federation quickly expanding across the Orion Arm, the Cardenas-class design only went through a single revision phase, with many of the initial engineering problems being worked out as the first spaceframes were being constructed. 

The Cardenas class became one of the more prestigious postings a person could gain in the early 23rd century. The speed that it was designed to utilize not only saw the vessel being dispatched to star systems along the Klingon and Romulan Neutral Zones for intercepts or chasing sensor shadows, but the vessel was also used as a high-speed explorer. As this class was highly specialized with its warp propulsion systems, refitting the spaceframe proved to be time consuming, resulting in this class spending almost double the amount of time in dry dock compared to other vessels of similar displacement. This issue compounded itself with the development of duotronic computers in the early 2240s. 

By 2245 the vast majority of Cardenas-class vessels were out of active service and undergoing service or refit. The launch of the Constitution-class vessel would bring the end of these vessels, and Starfleet would allow the spaceframes currently undergoing refit to continue, but would order the rest of the vessels to be mothballed. The last active Cardenas class, U.S.S. Van Allen, retired in 2263.
es:
Los éxitos vistos en las otras clases tras la Operación Next Step dieron al Almirantazgo la esperanza de que otras ideas que se habían propuesto en los primeros años del proyecto pudieran ampliarse y realizarse plenamente. Uno de esos conceptos era una “fragata de respuesta rápida” que tenía las mismas dimensiones que los diseños anteriores de Next Step. Con la Federación expandiéndose rápidamente a través del Brazo de Orión, el diseño de la clase Cárdenas solo pasó por una fase de revisión, y muchos de los problemas de ingeniería iniciales se resolvieron mientras se construían los primeros modelos.

La clase Cárdenas se convirtió en uno de los puestos más prestigiosos que una persona podía obtener a principios del siglo XXIII. La velocidad para la que fue diseñado no solo hizo que la nave fuera enviada a sistemas estelares a lo largo de las zonas neutrales klingon y romulanas para interceptar o perseguir sombras de sensores, sino que también se utilizó como explorador de alta velocidad. Como esta clase estaba altamente especializada con sus sistemas de propulsión warp, reacondicionar el modelo llevó mucho tiempo, lo que hizo que esta clase pasara casi el doble de tiempo en dique seco en comparación con otras naves de desplazamiento similar. Este problema se agravó con el desarrollo de las ordenadores duotrónicos a principios de la década de 2240.

En 2245, la gran mayoría de las naves clase Cárdenas estaban fuera de servicio activo y en servicio o reacondicionamiento. El lanzamiento de la nave clase Constitución produjo el fin de estas naves, pero la Flota Estelar permitiría que continuaran aquellas que actualmente se estaban reacondicionando, pero ordenó que el resto de las naves se retiraran. La última clase Cárdenas activa, el U.S.S. Van Allen, retirada en 2263.

en: In the mid-2280s, Starfleet felt that the next generation of light cruisers should begin development based on the new technologies being developed in tandem for the Excelsior class. The failures of the prototype transwarp systems in the Excelsior class meant delays for the light cruiser, then named the Centaur class. Extensive redesigns of most systems were undertaken by the mid-2290s, with additional vessels of the class beyond the prototype coming into service. Externally this class resembles the Excelsior class in many regards, including sharing the same saucer for its primary hull and elongated transwarp-style nacelles. Not as modular and mission-customizable as the Miranda class, the Centaur class would only be produced in small numbers, and was seen as a specialist vessel during an age when multipurpose vessels were in ascendancy in Starfleet Command.
es: A mediados de la década de 2280, la Flota Estelar consideró que la siguiente generación de cruceros ligeros debería comenzar a desarrollarse basándose en las nuevas tecnologías que se estaban desarrollando para la clase Excelsior. Los fallos en los prototipos de sistemas transcurvatura en la clase Excelsior significaron retrasos para el crucero ligero, entonces llamado clase Centaur. A mediados de la década de 2290 se llevaron a cabo extensos rediseños de la mayoría de los sistemas, y entraron en servicio naves adicionales de la clase además del prototipo. Externamente, esta clase se parece a la clase Excelsior en muchos aspectos, incluso comparte el mismo platillo para su casco principal y barquillas alargadas de estilo transcurvatura. Sin llegar a ser tan modular y personalizable para la misión como la clase Miranda, la clase Centaur solo se produciría en pequeñas cantidades y era vista como una nave especializada durante una época en la que las naves multipropósito estaban en ascenso en el Mando de la Flota Estelar.

en: The Constellation class was developed in the mid 2280s as both a response to increasing tension with the Klingon Empire and to the difficulties in the development of the new transwarp system for Excelsior-class vessels. The vessel was never intended as a warship of the kind used by the Empire, nor did it have as much weaponry as a fully-armed Miranda-class ship, but Constellation-class vessels were intended to be able to intercept incursions from the Empire at high warp speeds and survive until heavier reinforcements could arrive. This class’s intended use would never occur, as the Khitomer Accords were signed soon after the class’s widespread deployment. Instead of being taken out of service or redeployed, Constellation-class vessels were given different assignments, acting as first responders to crises across the Federation and the unclaimed sectors surrounding its slowly expanding borders.
es: La clase Constellation se desarrolló a mediados de la década de 2280 como respuesta a la creciente tensión con el Imperio Klingon y a las dificultades en el desarrollo del nuevo sistema trasncurvatura para las naves de la clase Excelsior. La nave nunca fue concebida como una nave de guerra del tipo utilizada por el Imperio, ni tenía tanto armamento como una nave clase Miranda completamente armada, pero las naves clase Constellation estaban destinadas a poder interceptar incursiones del Imperio en altas velocidades y sobrevivir hasta que pudieran llegar refuerzos más pesados. El uso previsto de esta clase nunca se produciría, ya que los Acuerdos de Khitomer se firmaron poco después del despliegue generalizado de la clase. En lugar de ser puestas fuera de servicio o redesplegadas, las naves clase Constellation recibieron diferentes asignaciones, siendo los primeros en responder a las crisis en toda la Federación y los sectores no reclamados que rodean sus fronteras.
fr: Sa conception remonte à la moitié des années 2280, période de grandes tensions entre l’Empire Klingon et la Fédération. À l’origine, il devait servir de patrouilleur et d’intercepteur lourd, mais sans pour autant ressembler à un vaisseau de guerre. Par conséquent, sa production se poursuivit malgré la signature des premiers Accords de Khitomer, en 2293. Il changea néanmoins d’affectation : au lieu de servir d’intercepteur, sa mission serait d’intervenir en cas d’urgence et de gérer les conflits qui pourraient rapidement dégénérer sans l’intervention de Starfleet.

en:
The symbol of Starfleet in the mid-to-late 23rd century, the Constitution class would become legendary across the Orion Spur due to its five-year missions.

Construction of the vessels was accomplished primarily in the Sol system, but after the initial block of vessels was completed and the first five-year missions were at an end, spaceframes were manufactured in other core world systems capable of handling the large spaceframe. The Constitution class would become the testbed of new technologies in the early 2270s that were developed out of the same classes’ five-year missions and lessons learned from the brief war with the Klingon Empire. The spaceframe continued in service until the mid-24th century.
es:
El símbolo de la Flota Estelar a mediados y finales del siglo 23, la clase Constitución se volvería legendaria en todo el Brazo de Orion debido a sus misiones de cinco años.

La construcción de las naves se llevó a cabo principalmente en el sistema solar, pero después de que se completó el bloque inicial de naves y finalizaron las primeras misiones de cinco años, este modelo también se fabricó en otros sistemas centrales del mundo capaces de manejar la gran estructura espacial necesaria. La clase Constitución se convertiría en el banco de pruebas de nuevas tecnologías a principios de la década de 2270 que se desarrollaron a partir de las misiones de cinco años de las mismas clases y las lecciones aprendidas de la breve guerra con el Imperio Klingon. Esta clase de nave continuó en servicio hasta mediados del siglo XXIV.
fr: Depuis le 23 e siècle, les vaisseaux de classe Constitution sont ceux qui représentent le mieux Starfleet. En 2235, l’organisation cherchait à améliorer la protection des mondes de la Fédération et à étendre son espace territorial. Elle décida qu’elle avait besoin d’un navire d’exploration plus robuste et polyvalent, qui serait en mesure de lutter si la menace d’un conflit imminent avec l’Empire Klingon venait à se concrétiser. Le design qu’ils mirent au point servit par la suite à des dizaines de classes de vaisseaux : une coque principale en forme de soucoupe, contenant la passerelle et la plupart des systèmes d’armement, une coque secondaire cylindrique hébergeant le noyau de distorsion, le déflecteur de navigation et le hangar à navettes, et reliée par deux entretoises à deux nacelles de distorsion, placées à bonne distance du vaisseau.

en:
Designed and produced in secret, the Crossfield class was produced solely to test the theoretical “displacement-activated spore hub drive” developed by Doctors Paul Stamets and Justin Straal. The launch of U.S.S. Crossfield in 2255 was a success for starship research and development for Starfleet, but initial tests of the spore drive were  unsuccessful. By early 2256, these flaws in the drive system were ironed out and the spaceframes were launched just prior to the outbreak of hostilities with the Klingon Empire.

With the limited number of spaceframes produced and the loss of both Glenn and Discovery to drive failures in 2256 and 2258 respectively, only U.S.S. Crossfield was left in service, and further spaceframes had their production canceled. Crossfield herself would continue in service with the Starfleet Corps of Engineers until a collision with a sizable piece of an asteroid rendered the vessel unsalvageable after being towed back to Spacedock in 2273. It remained there in use as a testbed for new technologies until it was finally broken up in 2290.

The Daedalus class served Starfleet as its primary patrol, colony support, and exploration craft prior to the introduction of the N X class. The rapidly expanding influence of United Earth meant the construction of these spaceframes had to occur at a rapid pace, meaning that these vessels were built with the lowest amount of advanced technology as  possible, as well as systems that would require little from shipyards for maintenance. The success of this class during the Earth-Romulan War, and its amazing adaptability, meant that it would continue to serve actively in Starfleet into the mid-23rd century, and in civilian support roles into the late 24th century.

As Starfleet had little experience in designing a warship from the ground up, the development of the Defiant class began before the destruction of the fleet at Wolf 359 by the Borg in 2367, and wouldn’t see the construction of the first spaceframe until 2371 – and only then after delays and massive redesigns, as new technology was developed to fight the Borg.
fr: Si la science et l’exploration sont les motivations principales de Starfleet, les exploits militaires ne sont pas sa priorité. L’organisation n’a que peu d’expérience concernant la conception de navires de guerre, à l’exception de quelques modèles réalisés pendant le conflit qui opposa la Terre à l’Empire Stellaire Romulien. Starfleet avait commencé à travailler sur la classe Defiant un an avant la bataille de Wolf 359, mais son développement et sa production sont devenus une priorité après cet affrontement désastreux contre le Collectif Borg. Les premiers tests du prototype ont révélé de sérieux défauts, et l’intégralité du projet a été mise au placard. Son développement ne reprit qu’en 2370, lorsque l’officier commandant de Deep Space 9 demanda que le prototype lui soit confié, alors que les tensions entre la Fédération et le Dominion ne cessaient de s’exacerber.

en:
The Engle class had gone so far as to have an experimental spaceframe constructed in 2208, and was finally finished with the advent of newer warp coil designs in 2224. Fast classes of starships such as the Cardenas class were useful, but required large amounts of material to produce, as well as significant amounts of energy to maintain a stable warp field. The Engle class was smaller, and required a much smaller warp core to maintain high velocities and a stable field.

The spaceframe proved to be popular for new member worlds of the Federation to request Starfleet to build at their shipyards due to its speed and size. During the 2230s and 40s many of the first Starfleet vessels to be assigned to a newly admitted or colonized world were Engles.

Engle-class vessels were relegated to Starfleet Medical as emergency response ships and kept in active service in that role until the late 2290s.

What was originally intended as a testbed for the highly experimental “transwarp” propulsion system, the “Great Experiment” was seen as a disaster after the complete failure of Excelsior’s propulsion systems in 2285. After a total redesign was performed on nearly all ship’s systems, the transwarp propulsion was replaced with standard warp propulsion. The versatile Excelsior spaceframe became a standard sight across the Federation and beyond, and continues to be manufactured into the 2390s.

The latter decades of the 24th century were tumultuous. The difficult political climate gave rise to a faction of hawks in Starfleet who insisted that deterrence was an important tool. If new war did come, Starfleet would need starships capable of engaging new adversaries. The Gagarin-class battlecruiser is one of several designs ordered by a Starfleet shedding its isolationism and preparing to face a new century of uncertainty.

The Galaxy class was designed to surpass any exploration and science vessel ever developed by Starfleet, including the most advanced technologies of the 2350s. This spaceframe also represented a totally new philosophy for crew mental well-being on long duration, deep space assignments, as it saw Starfleet providing facilities and living quarters for civilian dependents and volunteers. The concept centered on not separating families from loved ones for years at a time, and the morale on Galaxy-class vessels was correspondingly high.
fr: La classe Galaxy a été conçue pour être le meilleur vaisseau d’exploration scientifique jamais déployé par Starfleet. C’est pourquoi, lors de sa mise en service, il était équipé des meilleures technologies de la fin des années 2350, tout comme le classe Nebula qui avait un design identique. Il représentait également la nouvelle philosophie de Starfleet, qui souhaitait permettre aux officiers et aux équipages affectés à de longues missions aux confins de l’espace d’emmener avec eux leurs familles et leurs proches, au lieu de les en séparer pendant des années. Par conséquent, ce vaisseau spatial faisait partie des plus grands : il pouvait contenir jusqu’à deux mille membres d’équipage et leurs familles (même si dans les faits ce nombre s’élevait plutôt à mille), ainsi que quinze mille évacués en cas d’urgence. Entre quinze et vingt pourcents des personnes présentes à bord ne travaillaient pas pour Starfleet, et chaque vaisseau de classe Galaxy mettait à leur disposition des infrastructures et des services, comme des écoles pour les enfants, des bars, parfois même des restaurants, des crèches, et les plus grands holodecks de l’époque.

en: After a decade in service, Starfleet had seen the successes and failures of the Galaxy-class vessels then in service. As that large vessel was being used more as a diplomatic and command vessel than for exploration, Starfleet felt there was a need for a smaller and faster deep-space explorer. Containing the best technology of the early 2370s and evolved from the Nova class’s design and materials, the new Intrepid class was a symbol of the Federation Science Council’s intent to have Starfleet return to its stated goals of exploration and science. The Dominion War would reduce the number of hulls constructed, but the end of the war – and the return of U.S.S. Voyager to Federation space in 2378 – meant renewed passion for this spaceframe.
fr: Au milieu des années 2360, Starfleet était conscient des qualités et des défauts des vaisseaux de classe Galaxy. À cause de sa grande taille, de son équipage important, et du fait qu’il était plus souvent affecté aux missions d’ordre diplomatique qu’à l’exploration, les ingénieurs commencèrent à travailler sur le prochain grand explorateur : la classe Intrepid. Le premier navire fut introduit en grande pompe en 2371, et le Conseil Scientifique de la Fédération le considéra rapidement comme une précieuse ressource. Plus petit que la classe Galaxy, il ressemblait beaucoup à la classe Constitution, mais il était équipé de la meilleure technologie de la Fédération

en: The technological renaissance for the Federation in the late 24th century produced giant strides forward in almost every aspect of life for its citizens, and Starfleet saw each of these as an opportunity to push its design philosophy forward. The success of the Vesta class had Starfleet attempting to build a more automated and adaptive spaceframe capable of using quantum slipstream, and to be as modular as the Nebula and Luna classes. It was determined that installing a QSD would require far too many crew members to operate, and instead focus was put upon improving the vessel’s sustained cruising velocity. The Inquiry-class exploration cruiser was the result, and began replacing Miranda-class vessels almost immediately. The first large-scale deployment of these vessels was the 1st Devron Heavy Response Squadron under the command of Captain Riker in 2399.

With the design success of the Intrepid class, Starfleet immediately began the parallel development of a heavy explorer capable of all the same exploratory and scientific assignments of an Intrepid class, but with larger research facilities, more computer processing power, and longer mission duration. The Luna class exited its design phase eight months after her sister class, and while there were engineering delays, U.S.S. Luna NX-80101 slipped her drydock over Mars in late 2372. Further delays occurred because of the outbreak of war between the Klingon Empire, and later, the Dominion. While the Luna class was approved for production, further vessels weren’t launched until 2375.

Following encounters with the massive starships fielded by the Borg, Dominion, and the Remans, Starfleet planners were concerned that the Federation’s heavy cruisers were falling behind the curve on defensive and offensive capability. In response, the Admiralty decided to invest in an ambitious design program. The goal was to create Starfleet’s own iteration of a massive “star cruiser” that could compete with these super-capital-class starships on a peer footing. The project would yield the U.S.S. Odyssey, the U.S.S. Verity, and eventually the next Starship Enterprise, NCC-1701-F. The Odyssey class would carry the Federation’s flag into the 25th century as a beacon of hope during a  tumultuous era.

Starfleet’s order of battle has long emphasized the humble science vessel, to the point where many admiralty planners regularly complain that fleet resources are being misallocated given the recent belligerent political climate of the Galaxy. While the turn of the 25th century has certainly seen a shift in new construction away from pure research ships into cruisers and escorts, the Admiralty continues to pursue ways to build versatile starships that are useful as defense platforms but also excel at research and exploration. A sixth-generation example of Starfleet’s long-range science vessel, the Pathfinder’s namesake is the mission that helped bring the U.S.S. Voyager home 40 years ago.

The Admiralty needed a replacement for the Miranda class that could serve as the backbone of Starfleet’s logistical and operational support corps. Unlike the Miranda, which began life as a long-range cruiser and transitioned to logistical and support duties as it became outclassed by newer constructions, the Reliant would be designed as a support ship from its inception. The Reliant was one of the first starship classes to fully embrace the “sixth generation” of Starfleet starship technology, featuring more automation, more versatile particle emitters and sensors, and a fast but limited quantum slipstream burst projector.

The Ross-class exploration cruiser is an evolution of the large, long-range explorer-type vessel, building on the successes of its Galaxy-class predecessor. The Ross is a product of a variety of important advancements in Starfleet’s tactical and computational systems that came about in the 2370s. The Admiralty envisioned the Ross as a complement to the Sovereign-class assault cruiser. In contrast to the Sovereign’s focus on combat performance and fleet command, the Ross used its extra tonnage to host a large suite of diplomatic quarters, crew-support facilities, science labs, and even an auxiliary warp core.

The Sutherland-class research vessel is a long-range starship that represents a sixth-generation iteration on the medium exploration and survey cruiser, in the tradition of the Miranda, Constellation, and Nebula classes before it. It is a generational evolution from its Nebula-class predecessor and brings a selection of turn-of-the-century technologies to the long-range surveyor mission profile. The Sutherland design incorporates the “sixth generation” suite of starship technologies pioneered by the Reliant class into a much larger survey cruiser, with an emphasis on modernizing its defensive systems in addition to adding the latest research facilities.

Aenar usually have a single given name, as their enhanced senses allow them to tell the differences between two individuals with the same name based on the cadence of their voice, their heartbeat, and other physiological features.
ru: У Аэнар обычно одно имя, поскольку их обостренные чувства позволяют им различать двух людей с одинаковым именем на основе частоты их голоса, сердцебиения и других физиологических особенностей.
pt-BR: Os Aenar geralmente têm um único nome próprio, pois seus sentidos aprimorados lhes permitem distinguir dois indivíduos com o mesmo nome com base na cadência da voz, nos batimentos cardíacos e em outras características fisiológicas.

en: An offshoot of Andorians, the Aenar are a telepathic species whose lack of sight is compensated by their enhanced senses and telepathic abilities. Once thought to be a myth, the Aenar prefer their solitude and live in shielded communities far from their fellow Andorians. Though they are few in number, the Aenar are highly valued for their sensory capabilities. The Andorian government has granted them some degree of sovereignty to manage their own matters. While most prefer to stick to the polar icecaps of their homeworld, some Aenar have left Andoria to pursue careers in Starfleet or other efforts. Known for possessing a fascination with technology, some have gone on to become valued engineers.
ru: Ответвление андорианцев, аэнарцы - телепатическая раса, недостаток зрения которых компенсируется их обостренными чувствами и телепатическими способностями. Когда-то считавшиеся мифом, аэнарцы предпочитают одиночество и живут в защищенных сообществах вдали от своих собратьев-андорианцев. Хотя их немного, аэнар высоко ценятся за свои сенсорные способности. Андорианское правительство предоставило им некоторую степень суверенитета в решении своих собственных дел. В то время как большинство предпочитает оставаться на полярных ледниках своей родной планеты, некоторые Аэнар покинули Андорию, чтобы продолжить карьеру в Звездном Флоте или заняться другими делами. Известные своим увлечением технологиями, некоторые из них впоследствии стали ценными инженерами.
pt-BR: Uma ramificação dos andorianos, os Aenar são uma espécie telepática cuja falta de visão é compensada por seus sentidos aprimorados e habilidades telepáticas. Antes considerados um mito, os Aenar preferem a solidão e vivem em comunidades protegidas, longe de seus companheiros andorianos. Embora sejam poucos, os Aenar são altamente valorizados por suas capacidades sensoriais. O governo andoriano lhes concedeu algum grau de soberania para administrar seus próprios assuntos. Embora a maioria prefira ficar nas calotas polares de seu planeta natal, alguns Aenar deixaram Andoria para seguir carreiras na Frota Estelar ou em outras atividades. Conhecidos por seu fascínio pela tecnologia, alguns se tornaram engenheiros de valor.

en: I May Be Blind but I See it as Clear as Day
ru: Потребности в насилии никогда не существует
pt-BR: Posso ser cego, mas vejo tudo tão claro quanto o dia

en: The Aenar were a subspecies of Andorians who were on the verge of extinction by the mid-22nd century. They had two antennae and no skin or hair pigmentation. Their most distinctive trait was their telepathic abilities, which included reading minds and psychically projecting themselves into the minds of other humanoids.
ru: Аэнар - подвид андорианцев, находившийся на грани исчезновения к середине 22 века. У них было две антенны и отсутствовала пигментация кожи и волос. Их самой отличительной чертой были телепатические способности, которые включали чтение мыслей и психическое проецирование себя в разум других гуманоидов.
pt-BR: Os Aenar eram uma subespécie de andorianos que estavam à beira da extinção em meados do século 22. Eles tinham duas antenas e não tinham pigmentação de pele ou cabelo. Sua característica mais marcante eram as habilidades telepáticas, que incluíam ler mentes e se projetar psiquicamente nas mentes de outros humanoides.

en: Though biologically similar to Andorians, Aenar have developed their own culture and abilities that make them distinct from their cousins. Though many consider their lack of ability to see a hindrance, the Aenar possess senses that allow them to read text with their fingers and are able to tell distances based on how far away something sounds to them. Their telepathic capabilities make them highly valued by other species as well, and with technological aid some are able to project their thoughts over vast distances. Some Aenar have a sardonic view of the world while others seem to be filled with endless curiosity about what they can experience outside of their communes.
ru: Несмотря на то, что биологически они похожи на андорианцев, Аэнар развили собственную культуру и способности, которые отличают их от своих собратьев. Хотя многие считают, что у них нет способности видеть препятствие, аэнары обладают чувствами, которые позволяют им читать текст пальцами и способны определять расстояния в зависимости от того, насколько далеко для них что-то звучит. Их телепатические способности делают их высоко ценимыми и среди других видов, а с технологической помощью некоторые из них способны проецировать свои мысли на огромные расстояния. У некоторых Эйнаров сардонический взгляд на мир, в то время как другие, кажется, полны бесконечного любопытства по поводу того, что они могут испытать за пределами своих коммун.
pt-BR: Embora biologicamente semelhantes aos andorianos, os Aenar desenvolveram sua própria cultura e habilidades que os tornam distintos de seus primos. Embora muitos considerem sua falta de capacidade de enxergar um obstáculo, os Aenar possuem sentidos que lhes permitem ler textos com os dedos e são capazes de distinguir distâncias baseadas no quão longe algo soa para eles. Suas capacidades telepáticas os tornam altamente valorizados por outras espécies também e, com ajuda tecnológica, alguns conseguem projetar seus pensamentos a grandes distâncias. Alguns Aenar têm uma visão sardônica do mundo, enquanto outros parecem estar cheios de curiosidade infinita sobre o que podem experimentar fora de suas comunidades.

en: Andorian names tend to be somewhat harsh-sounding, and have a personal name followed by a clan name. Amongst some Andorians, it’s common to begin the clan name with a gender-specific prefix: 'zh' or 'sh' for females, and 'ch' or 'th' for males. This is placed before the family name, separated by an apostrophe. Longer or more complicated Andorian names are commonly shortened, especially when dealing with other species. Examples: Ishrelia zh’Azonan (female), Atheth th’Zynes(male)
fr: Les noms ANDORIENS ont en général des sonorités dures, et comprennent un prénom suivi du nom du clan. Certains Andoriens ont l’habitude de faire précéder le nom du clan d’un préfixe de genre (« zh » pour les femmes et « ch » ou « th » pour les hommes) et d’une apostrophe ; il sera placé avant le nom de famille. Les noms andoriens plus longs ou plus compliqués seront raccourcis, en particulier quand ils ont affaire à d’autres espèces.
ru: Имена АНДОРИАНЦЕВ, как правило, звучат достаточно резко и состоят из личного и кланового имён. Среди некоторых андорианцев принято начинать клановое имя с гендерной приставки: «ж» или «ш» для женщин и «ч» или «т» для мужчин. Этот префикс ставится перед фамилией и отделяется апострофом. Длинные или сложные андорианские имена обычно укорачиваются, особенно при общении с другими видами.
pt-BR: Os nomes andorianos tendem a ter uma sonoridade áspera e têm os nomes pessoais seguidos de um nome de clã. Entre alguns Andorianos, é comum começar o nome do clã com um prefixo específico de gênero: 'zh' ou 'sh' para nome femininos e 'ch' ou 'th' para nomes masculinos. Esse prefixo é colocado antes do nome de família, separado por um apóstrofo. Nomes andorianos mais longos ou complicados são comumente abreviados, especialmente quando se trata de outras espécies. Exemplos: Ishrelia zh'Azonan (feminino), Atheth th'Zynes (masculino)

en: An aggressive, passionate people from the frozen moon Andoria, the Andorians have been part of the United Federation of Planets since its foundation, having been firm allies of Humanity for several years beforehand. Their blue skin, pale hair, and antennae give them a distinctive appearance, and while the Andorian Imperial Guard was demobilized when the Federation was founded, they still maintain strong military traditions, and a tradition of ritualized honor-duels known as Ushaan, using razorsharp ice-mining tools.
de: Die Andorianer, ein aggressives, leidenschaftliches Volk vom Eismond Andoria, sind seit ihrer Gründung Teil der Vereinten Föderation der Planeten und waren schon in den Jahren zuvor verlässliche Verbündete der Menschen. Ihre blaue Haut, ihr weißes Haar und ihre Antennen verleihen ihnen ein unverwechselbares Erscheinungsbild, und auch wenn die Imperiale Andorianische Garde mit Gründung der Föderation außer Dienst gestellt wurde, unterhalten sie immer noch starke militärische Traditionen und den Brauch eines ritualisierten Ehrenduells, das als Ushaan bekannt ist und rasiermesserscharfe, beim Eisbergbau genutzte Werkzeuge verwendet.
fr: Ce peuple agressif et passionné originaire de la lune glacée d’Andoria fait partie de la Fédération des Planètes Unies depuis sa création, et il était déjà un fidèle allié de l’humanité depuis déjà plusieurs années. Leur peau bleue, leurs cheveux pâles et leurs antennes leur confèrent une apparence distinctive. Si la Garde impériale andorienne a été démobilisée quand la Fédération est née, ils ont conservé de fortes traditions militaires, ainsi qu’un rituel de duel d’honneur appelé Ushaan au cours duquel on utilise des outils pour creuser la glace affûtés comme des rasoirs.
ru:
Агрессивный и пылкий народ с замороженной луны Андории. Андорианцы входят в состав Объединённой Федерации Планет с момента её основания; до этого они несколько лет были надёжными союзниками человечества. Их неповторимый облик отличает голубая кожа, бледные волосы и антенны. Хотя Андорианская
Имперская Гвардия была распущена при создании Федерации, они до сих пор сохраняют сильные военные традиции и обычай ритуальных дуэлей чести, известных как «ушаан» или «юшаан», в которых используются ручные ледорубы.
pt-BR: Um povo agressivo e passional da lua congelada de Andoria, os Andorianos fazem parte da Federação Unida dos Planetas desde sua fundação, tendo sido firmes aliados da Humanidade por vários anos antes. Sua pele azul, cabelos claros e antenas lhes dão uma aparência distinta e, embora a Guarda Imperial Andoriana tenha sido desmobilizada quando a Federação foi fundada, eles ainda mantêm fortes tradições militares e uma tradição de duelos de honra ritualizados conhecidos como Ushaan, usando ferramentas de mineração de gelo bastante afiadas.

en: An aggressive, passionate people from a frozen moon. Founding member of the Federation. Blue-skinned, pale-haired in appearance, with antennae. Their antennae aid in balance and spatial awareness; a lost antenna can be debilitating until it regrows. Andorians also have a high metabolism, meaning, among other things, that they tire more quickly than Humans; this also makes them more vulnerable to infection from certain types of injury.
ru: Агрессивный и пылкий народ с замороженной луны Андории. Андорианцы входят в состав Объединённой Федерации Планет с момента её основания; до этого они несколько лет были надёжными союзниками человечества. Их неповторимый облик отличает голубая кожа, бледные волосы и антенны. Хотя Андорианская Имперская Гвардия была распущена при создании Федерации, они до сих пор сохраняют сильные военные традиции и обычай ритуальных дуэлей чести, известных как «ушаан» или «юшаан», в которых используются ручные ледорубы.
pt-BR: Um povo agressivo e passional de uma lua congelada. Membro fundador da Federação. De pele azulada e cabelos claros, com antenas. Suas antenas ajudam no equilíbrio e na percepção espacial; a perda de uma antena pode ser debilitante até que ela cresça novamente. Os Andorianos também têm um metabolismo elevado, o que significa, entre outras coisas, que eles se cansam mais rapidamente do que os humanos; isso também os torna mais vulneráveis a infecções causadas por certos tipos de ferimentos.

en: This trait may reduce the Difficulty of Tasks to resist extreme cold, or Tasks impacted by extremely low temperatures. Their antennae aid in balance and spatial awareness; a lost antenna can be debilitating until it regrows. Andorians also have a high metabolism, meaning, amongst other things, that they tire more quickly than Humans; this also makes them more vulnerable to infection from certain types of injury. Before the Federation, Andorians and Vulcans had numerous disputes; though these issues are largely considered to be ancient history, Andorians and Vulcans don’t always get along.
de: Dieses Merkmal senkt die Schwierigkeit aller Aufgaben, um extremer Kälte zu widerstehen, oder aller Aufgaben, welche von extrem niedrigen Temperaturen negativ beeinflusst werden. Die Antennen unterstützen bei der Balance und räumlichen Wahrnehmung, während eine verlorene Antenne diese Fähigkeiten hemmt, bis sie nachgewachsen ist. Andorianer haben einen hohen Metabolismus, was unter anderem bedeutet, dass sie schneller ermüden als Menschen. Dies macht sie auch anfälliger für bestimmte Infektionen, vor allem solchen, die durch Verletzungen verursacht werden. Vor Gründung der Föderation hatten Andorianer und Vulkanier zahllose Auseinandersetzungen. Auch wenn diese Probleme von den meisten schon seit langem als der Vergangenheit zugehörig angesehen werden, verstehen sich Andorianer und Vulkanier auch heute nicht immer.
fr: Ce Trait réduit la difficulté des Tâches quand il s’agitde résister au froid extrême, ou des Tâches influencées par des températures particulièrement basses. Leurs antennes améliorent leur équilibre et leur conscience de l’espace ; perdre l’une d’entre elles peut être très handicapant jusqu’à ce qu’elle repousse. Les Andoriens ont également un métabolisme très rapide, ce qui signifie entre autres qu’ils se fatiguent plus vite que les Humains. Cela les rend aussi plus sensibles aux infec-tions considérées comme appartenant au passé. Les Andoriens et les Vulcains ne s’entendent parfois pas très bien.
ru:
Эта Черта снижает сложность Задач сопро-
тивлению экстремальному холоду или Задач, на которые влияет чрезвычайно низкая температура. Антенны помогают андорианцам держать равновесие и ориентироваться в пространстве, а лишившийся антенны андорианец может сильно ослабеть, пока этот орган не отрастёт заново. У них быстрый метаболизм, то есть, среди прочего, они устают быстрее, чем люди; это также означает, что андорианцы уязвимы к инфекциям при некоторых видах травм. До создания Федерации андорианцы и вулканцы вели многочисленные споры и хотя эти вопросы во многом относятся к древней истории, они до сих пор не всегда ладят друг с другом.
pt-BR: Esse traço pode reduzir a Dificuldade de Tarefas para resistir a frio extremo ou a Tarefas impactadas por temperaturas extremamente baixas. Suas antenas ajudam no equilíbrio e na alerta espacial; uma antena perdida pode ser debilitante até que cresça novamente. Andorianos também possuem um metabolismo alto, o que significa, entre outras coisas, que eles se cansam mais rapidamente do que Humanos; isso também os torna mais vulneráveis a infecção de certos tipos de ferimentos. Antes da Federação, os Andorianos e os Vulcanos tiveram várias disputas; e embora estes problemas sejam amplamente considerados história antiga, Andorianos e Vulcanos nem sempre se dão bem.

en: Aquan names are typically a single word composed of just a few syllables.
pt-BR: Os nomes Aquan são geralmente uma única palavra composta de apenas algumas sílabas.

en:
The humanoid, water-breathing Aquans were transformed indigenous inhabitants of the planet Argo. They had green skin, flat noses, hair resembling kelp, webbed hands, and fins on their ankles. Argo was once mostly land, but planetary-wide seismic disturbances caused the land to gradually sink into the sea. Though not everyone chose the procedure, the medically advanced Aquans developed drugs to turn themselves into an aquatic species. Although they had the means to reverse the transformation, once they became water breathers, they chose to forget their past and construct a new society beneath the sea.

The reversal formula was lost to time, and the remaining air breathers were seen as enemies. Among the water-breathing Aquans’ many medical talents were the manipulation and erasure of memories, which they used on their enemies.

In 2269, the _Enterprise_ was studying Argo, unaware of any intelligent life on the planet, when a catastrophic seaquake put Kirk and Spock in peril of drowning.

Fortunately, they were saved by some of the Aquans and transformed into sea-breathers. With the help of the Aquans, they were able to find a way to reverse the transformation, and some younger Aquans chose to also use the drug so they could experience life on the surface of their world.

Today, both groups of Aquans live in peace on Argo, and within a year of first contact, a handful of Aquans, both air and water breathers, joined Starfleet.
pt-BR:
Os humanoides Aquans, que respiram água, foram transformados em habitantes indígenas do planeta Argo. Eles tinham pele verde, nariz achatado, cabelos parecidos com algas, mãos com membranas e nadadeiras nos tornozelos. Argo já foi principalmente terra, mas distúrbios sísmicos em todo o planeta fizeram com que a terra afundasse gradualmente no mar. Embora nem todos tenham optado pelo procedimento, os Aquans medicamente avançados desenvolveram drogas para se transformarem em uma espécie aquática. Embora tivessem os meios para reverter a transformação, uma vez que se tornaram respiradores de água, optaram por esquecer seu passado e construir uma nova sociedade no fundo do mar.

A fórmula de reversão se perdeu no tempo, e os remanescentes que respiravam ar eram vistos como inimigos. Entre os muitos talentos médicos dos Aquans que respiram água estavam a manipulação e o apagamento de memórias, que eles usavam em seus inimigos.

Em 2269, a _Enterprise_ estava estudando Argo, sem saber da existência de vida inteligente no planeta, quando um terremoto catastrófico colocou Kirk e Spock em risco de afogamento.

Felizmente, eles foram salvos por alguns dos Aquans e transformados em respiradores marinhos. Com a ajuda dos Aquans, eles conseguiram encontrar uma maneira de reverter a transformação, e alguns Aquans mais jovens optaram por também usar a droga para que pudessem experimentar a vida na superfície de seu mundo.

Hoje, os dois grupos de aquans vivem em paz em Argo e, um ano após o primeiro contato, um punhado de aquans, tanto respiradores de ar quanto de água, juntou-se à Frota Estelar.

en: Air breathers rarely come in peace
pt-BR: Os que respiram ar raramente vêm em paz

en: Aquans are water breathers and expert swimmers who spend their lives in underwater environments. However, it is possible for them to transform into air breathers if they have access to the reversal formula rediscovered by the Enterprise crew.
pt-BR: Os Aquans são respiradores de água e nadadores experientes que passaram suas vidas em ambientes subaquáticos. No entanto, é possível que eles se transformem em respiradores de ar se tiverem acesso à fórmula de reversão redescoberta pela tripulação da Enterprise.

en: Like many Humanoid species within the Federation, the Arbazan are physically similar to Humans, though the forward portion of their skulls have slightly raised plates that reinforce their brows. Arbazan have been Federation members since shortly after its founding and are found throughout Federation space, often serving as ambassadors, attaches, advisors, and negotiators – though there have also been several well-known scientific discoveries and engineering advancements by dedicated Arbazan.
pt-BR: Como muitas espécies humanóides da Federação, os Arbazan são fisicamente semelhantes aos humanos, embora a parte anterior de seus crânios tenha placas ligeiramente elevadas que reforçam suas sobrancelhas. Os Arbazan são membros da Federação desde um pouco depois de sua fundação e são encontrados em todo o espaço da Federação, muitas vezes servindo como embaixadores, adidos, conselheiros e negociadores - embora também tenha havido várias descobertas científicas e avanços de engenharia bem conhecidos feitos por Arbazan dedicados.

en: Ardana natives are hardy individuals, whose duality of art and culture, and resource mining and management, make them excellent all-rounders. The Ardanans are a people of both stout endurance and cultural excellence.
pt-BR: Os nativos de Ardana são indivíduos resistentes, cuja dualidade de arte e cultura e de mineração e gerenciamento de recursos os torna excelentes profissionais polivalentes. Os Ardanans são um povo de resistência robusta e excelência cultural.

en: Arcadians tend to have a given name and surname. Being aquatic in nature, they have a long, flowing name delivered as a series of clicks and melodic music, though they try to have a name that is more easily understood by terrestrial beings. Arcadian names usually translate to something peaceful or beautiful, such as “Melody” or “Windsong.” Arcadians who choose more sinister translations of their names are considered to be outliers among the pacifistic species.
pt-BR: Os Arcadianos tendem a ter um nome próprio e um sobrenome. Por serem de natureza aquática, eles têm um nome longo e fluido, pronunciado como uma série de cliques e música melódica, embora tentem ter um nome que seja mais facilmente compreendido por seres terrestres. Os nomes dos Arcadianos geralmente se traduzem em algo pacífico ou belo, como "Melodia" ou "Canção do Vento". Os Arcadianos que escolhem traduções mais sombrias de seus nomes são considerados anômalos entre as espécies pacifistas.

en: The Federation’s philosophy of bringing peace between species across the Galaxy is embraced fervently by the pacifistic Arcadians. An aquatic species, the Arcadians believe that violence desecrates the great gift of life their species has been endowed with. The Arcadians’ brains are structured so that they are capable of learning multiple tasks simultaneously and they are often able to learn foreign languages astonishingly fast. The Arcadians are able to survive outside of water for great periods of time but find doing so physically taxing. Their dedication to peace means their homeworld has been conquered several times over the years, and the rich dilithium mines and precious ores beneath their oceans make their world a tempting target by those not swayed by their pleas for peace.
pt-BR: A filosofia da Federação de trazer a paz entre as espécies em toda a Galáxia é abraçada com fervor pelos pacifistas Arcadianos. Espécie aquática, os Arcadianos acreditam que a violência profana a grande dádiva da vida que foi concedida à sua espécie. Os cérebros dos Arcadianos são estruturados de forma que eles são capazes de aprender várias tarefas simultaneamente e, muitas vezes, conseguem aprender idiomas estrangeiros com uma rapidez surpreendente. Os Arcadianos são capazes de sobreviver fora da água por longos períodos de tempo, mas acham isso fisicamente desgastante. Sua dedicação à paz significa que seu planeta natal foi conquistado várias vezes ao longo dos anos, e as ricas minas de dilítio e minérios preciosos sob seus oceanos tornam seu mundo um alvo tentador para aqueles que não se deixam influenciar por seus apelos à paz.

en: Peace Is an Ideal Worth Dying For
pt-BR: A Paz é um Ideal Pelo Qual Vale a Pena Morrer

en: The Arcadians have developed an advanced culture that resolves its problems through the use of applied logic. If two individuals cannot come to an agreement, they rely upon a complex legal system to settle the dispute. The Arcadians accept that violence is a sad constant in the universe but refuse to add to the problems it causes.
